summary: U6 Scenarios 2.0 implementation testing completed successfully - backend scenario pack generation and frontend ScenarioBox component rendering Bear/Base/Bull scenarios with real data

minor_issues.issue: Missing phaseSnapshot data for Market Mode card
minor_issues.impact: One signal header card shows as unavailable

passed_tests: U6: GET /api/fractal/v2.1/focus-pack returns complete scenario object with horizonDays, basePrice, returns, targets, probUp, sampleSize
U6: Scenario targets are different for 7d vs 365d horizons ($74K vs $595K for P90)
U6: ScenarioBox component renders Bear/Base/Bull cards with prices and return percentages
U6: RangeStrip shows P10-P90 range visualization
U6: OutcomeStats displays probUp (65%), avgMaxDD (16.7%), tailRiskP95 (-29.8%), sampleSize (20)
U6: dataStatus shows REAL when sampleSize (20) >= 5
Frontend /fractal page loads and displays ScenarioBox component successfully
Backend API returns proper nested focusPack structure with scenario data
Different focus horizons return different scenario calculations
All scenario cards show target prices and return percentages correctly
